soffico.customerapi.component.configuration

Class ConfigurationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • soffico.customerapi.component.configuration.ConfigurationManager

  • public final class ConfigurationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to get access to your components configuration and configuration type outside of the component browser/configuration editor see ORC-643 works with Orchestra Component Architecture API/Impl 2.24 earlier Versions would lead to errors if used in persistent process models as process variables
